PageTitle: display ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics
FuncDef: The display ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics command displays statistics about the current proxy ND.
CLIs: display ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics [ slot <slot-num> | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
interface-type: specifies the type of a specified interface. The value is a string of case-insensitive characters and does not contain spaces.interface-number: specifies the number of an interface. The value is a string of case-insensitive characters and does not contain spaces. An interface number is in the format of slot number/subcard number/port number.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view statistics about the current proxy ND, run the display ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics command.
